title: List of Ministers for Transport of Luxembourg
text:
The Minister for Transport () was a position in the <a href="Luxembourg">Luxembourg</a>ian <a href="Cabinet%20%28government%29">cabinet</a>. The Minister for Transport was responsible for maintenance and revision of the <a href="road">road</a> network, operation of <a href="public%20transport">public transport</a>, and regulation of <a href="aviation">aviation</a> and <a href="waterway">waterway</a>s.
On 23 July 2009, the position was merged with those of the <a href="Minister%20for%20the%20Environment%20of%20Luxembourg">Ministry for the Environment</a> and <a href="Minister%20for%20Public%20Works%20of%20Luxembourg">Minister for Public Works</a> to form the new position of <a href="Minister%20for%20Sustainable%20Development%20and%20Infrastructure%20of%20Luxembourg">Minister for Sustainable Development and Infrastructure</a>, under <a href="Claude%20Wiseler">Claude Wiseler</a>.
